content: When his dialogue begins to repeat, resume your exploration of the area. First, go over to where there are four chests by the wall (opposite where you first entered the area). Two of the chests are already open, but there are two more to loot. Inside these, you'll find Cold Iron Leaves, Will, a Mind Core, and a Gold Tree Core.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass I' and the sub-subsection 'Boss Fight - Pale-Axe Stalwart'.
The content is as follows:
When his dialogue begins to repeat, resume your exploration of the area. First, go over to where there are four chests by the wall (opposite where you first entered the area). Two of the chests are already open, but there are two more to loot. Inside these, you'll find Cold Iron Leaves, Will, a Mind Core, and a Gold Tree Core.
